list_definition.definition: a group of people watching or listening to a performance etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There was an audience of at least 4000 people at the concert

list_definition.definition: a formal interview with someone important eg a king

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was granted an audience with the Pope.
